epic_title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
title: Implement multi-factor authentication for enhanced security
description: As a customer, I want to log into the self-service portal using multi-factor authentication, so that I can enhance the security of my account.
attributes_and_rules: Support for SMS, email, and authenticator app for multi-factor authentication; Compliant with industry standards.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users must be able to set up and use multi-factor authentication (MFA). 2. MFA should be required during login.
test_cases: Given that I am setting up MFA, when I choose an authentication method, then I should be able to complete the setup and use it during login.

epic_title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
title: Introduce robust encryption mechanisms for data in transit and at rest
description: As a developer, I want to ensure data is encrypted in transit and at rest, so that we can protect sensitive information from unauthorized access.
attributes_and_rules: TLS for data in transit; AES-256 for data at rest.
acceptance_criteria: 1. All data in transit must be encrypted using TLS. 2. All stored data must be encrypted using AES-256.
test_cases: Given that data is being transmitted, when it is in transit, then it must be encrypted using TLS. Given that data is stored, when it is at rest, then it must be encrypted using AES-256.

epic_title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
title: Establish role-based access control mechanisms
description: As an administrator, I want to ensure users have access only to appropriate features and data, so that we maintain security and compliance.
attributes_and_rules: Define roles and permissions clearly; Implement access control checks across the system.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users must have access only to features and data relevant to their role. 2. Unauthorized access attempts must be logged and denied.
test_cases: Given a user with a specific role, when they access the system, then they should only access features and data permitted to their role. Given an unauthorized access attempt, when a user tries to access restricted data, then it should be logged and denied.

title: Design a modern, responsive user interface
description: As a user, I want a responsive interface across devices, so that I can have a consistent and seamless experience on desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.
attributes_and_rules: Consistent design for different screen sizes; Maintain usability across devices.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The interface must adjust responsively across various devices. 2. Users should have a seamless experience regardless of the device used.
test_cases: Given a user accessing the portal on different devices, when they navigate the interface, then they should have a consistent and responsive experience.

title: Ensure compliance with accessibility standards
description: As a product owner, I want the design to meet accessibility standards, so that it is usable for all types of users including those with disabilities.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The design must comply with WCAG 2.1 standards. 2. All key actions must be accessible to users with disabilities.
test_cases: Given a user with disabilities, when they interact with the interface, then it should be fully usable and compliant with WCAG 2.1 standards.

title: Create an intelligent and customizable dashboard
description: As a user, I want a dashboard that displays key financial information and recommended products, so that I can manage my finances more effectively.
attributes_and_rules: Real-time updates, user profile customization, shortcut features.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Dashboard must display real-time account information. 2. Users must be able to customize their dashboard view.
test_cases: Given a user, when they log in to the portal, then they should see real-time financial information on their dashboard. Given a user with specific preferences, when they customize their dashboard, then their changes should be saved and displayed accordingly.

epic_title: Online Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
title: Design end-to-end workflows for online account opening
description: As a customer, I want to open a new account online, so that I can avoid visiting a physical branch.
attributes_and_rules: Auto-filled data, adaptive forms, real-time validations.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Customers must be able to complete online account opening with minimal friction. 2. All data validations must happen in real-time.
test_cases: Given a customer providing required data, when they attempt to open an account, then the system should auto-fill relevant information and validate inputs in real-time.

epic_title: Document Upload and Draft Application Management
title: Allow users to save incomplete applications as drafts
description: As a user, I want to save my application progress as a draft, so that I can complete it later without losing any information.
attributes_and_rules: Save progress, retrieve drafts, user-friendly interactions.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users must be able to save their application progress at any stage. 2. Drafts must be retrievable for later completion.
test_cases: Given a user filling out an application, when they save their progress, then the draft should be retrievable and editable at a later stage.

title: Develop a notification and status tracking module
description: As a customer, I want to track the status of my requests, so that I can stay informed about their progress in real-time.
attributes_and_rules: Real-time status, automated notifications, history logs.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Customers must be able to view real-time status updates of their requests. 2. Automated notifications must inform users of request progress.
test_cases: Given a customer request in the system, when its status changes, then the customer should receive a real-time update and notification.

title: Integrate the self-service portal with the core banking system
description: As a technical lead, I want to sync data between the self-service portal and the core banking system, so that customer information and account details remain consistent.
attributes_and_rules: APIs or microservices, real-time synchronization, data consistency.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Data must sync in real-time between the portal and core banking system. 2. Must ensure data consistency and high availability.
test_cases: Given data in the portal and core banking system, when changes occur on either side, then both systems should reflect the same information in real-time.

epic_title: Dedicated Portal Database and Performance Optimization
title: Establish a dedicated database for the self-service portal
description: As a database administrator, I want to optimize database performance, so that the self-service portal can scale and respond quickly to user actions.
attributes_and_rules: Indexing, caching, data partitioning, performance monitoring.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The database must be optimized for high performance and quick response times. 2. Monitoring tools must detect performance issues effectively.
test_cases: Given a high load on the portal, when users interact with the system, then the database should maintain optimal performance and responsiveness.

title: Maintain a comprehensive log of all customer interactions
description: As an auditor, I want a secure audit trail of all portal activities, so that I can ensure compliance and oversight.
attributes_and_rules: Immutable logs, timestamping, encryption, compliance adherence.
acceptance_criteria: 1. All user interactions must be logged with timestamps and immutably stored. 2. Logs must ensure compliance with regulatory requirements.
test_cases: Given user interactions within the portal, when an action is performed, then it should be recorded in the audit log with immutable and compliant storage.
